original_text: Some of the sailors tried to leave the ship. They put the small boat into the sea. They tried to go away secretly. They said, ‘We are going to the front of the ship to put some more anchors down into the sea.’ But that was not true.
korean_text: 사공들이 도망하고자 하여 이물에서 닻을 내리는 체하고 거룻배를 바다에 내려 놓거늘

sentences.original_text: Some of the sailors tried to leave the ship.
They put the small boat into the sea.
They tried to go away secretly.
They said, 'We are going to the front of the ship
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 말했습니다, '우리는 배 앞으로 가고 있습니다.'

sentences.original_text: to put some more anchors down into the sea.'
sentences.korean_translation: 더 많은 닻을 바다에 내리기 위해서입니다.'
